mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, nickname, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{created_at})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, role, created_at, nickname, provider, url FROM users WHERE username = #{username} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
